overview: In one day and night alone, a crowd of obstacles appears on a young tiger’s route, convinced that a plot is brewing. ‘Jungle Tale’: Young, dynamic manager caught in the trap of his Machiavellian everyday life, Shere Khan comes out of work and returns home. A considerable number of closed doors, narrow alleys slipping by in a cold light rise up against him. The statues also show in contrast, the emptiness of his hectic life. A man who is going to quickly lose himself. This film followed the criteria of November 2001: a short film with a striped synopsis.
title: Sheer Khan
